title: The default value set in list box of report parameter is lost after modifying the default value
description:
Description: The default value set in the list box of a report parameter is lost after modifying the default value. 
Steps to reproduce: 
1. Create a report parameter and set the Display type to List Box. 
2. Input three values: 'aa', 'bb', 'cc', and set 'aa' as the default value. Click OK. 
3. Reopen the Edit Parameter dialog and modify 'aa' to 'aaa'. Click OK directly. 
4. Reopen the Edit Parameter dialog.
OB: The default value set in the list box of the report parameter is not retained after modifying the default value.
SR:
Steps to reproduce: 
1. Create a report parameter and set the Display type to List Box. 
2. Input three values: 'aa', 'bb', 'cc', and set 'aa' as the default value. Click OK. 
3. Reopen the Edit Parameter dialog and modify 'aa' to 'aaa'. Click OK. 
4. Reopen the Edit Parameter dialog. 
Expected behavior: The modified default value 'aaa' should be retained in the list box of the report parameter.
